stemming

Stemming algorithms

ref auto stemSwedish(S)(S s) if (isSomeString!S);
Stem Swedish Word .

Tuple!(S, Lang) stemIn(S)(S s, Lang lang = Lang.unknown) if (isSomeString!S);
Stem in Language . If lang is unknown try each known language until failure.

Tuple!(bool, Lang) stemize(S)(ref S s, Lang lang = Lang.unknown) if (isSomeString!S);
Destructively Stem in Language .

S alternativePorterStemEnglish(S)(S s) if (isSomeString!S);
Return Stem of using Porter's algorithm See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I_m_still_remembering See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Porter See also: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2s7f8mBwnko&list=PL6397E4B26D00A269&index=4.
